definition: white paper (e.g. containing proposals for new legislation)/white book
dermis (layer within the skin containing sense of touch)

sentences.english: Melon's skin is thin, only about one-third of thick watermelon rind.
sentences.chinese: 哈密瓜的皮很薄，大約只有西瓜皮的三分之一厚。

sentences.english: That situation has often been compared to peeling the skins of an onion.
sentences.chinese: 這正如一層一層剝下洋蔥皮。

sentences.english: The result evidently indicates a possible halo-like neutron skin of 13C.
sentences.chinese: 這說明13C可能存在着一個類暈的中子皮。

sentences.english: Lippi overlooks last summer's Confederations Cup, in which his team lost to Egypt and Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 裏皮回想去在聯合會杯上他的隊伍輸給埃及和巴西后。

sentences.english: It didn't take long for Zimmer to realize he had landed on a school of crappie.
sentences.chinese: 它沒有多久齊默實現他對學校的克拉皮降落。

sentences.english: The covering of leather, cloth, or other material being then affixed to the boards.
sentences.chinese: 然後裱上包封用的皮，布或其他材料。

sentences.english: Snakes cast off and renew their skins.
sentences.chinese: 蛇脫了皮，又再長出皮來。

sentences.english: Spread some flour on the table and roll the pastry out very thin .
sentences.chinese: 在桌子上撒些麪粉把餡餅皮擀得很薄。

sentences.english: The couple had a heck of an argument and kept us awake all night.
sentences.chinese: 爭得夠嗆，弄得咱們一晚上沒眨眼皮。

sentences.english: There are several vacant plots available for building on in the area.
sentences.chinese: 那個地區還有好幾塊空地皮可以用來造房子。

sentences.english: These fruit knives are very good for stripping apple skins off.
sentences.chinese: 這種水果刀削蘋果皮很好用。

sentences.english: Our fur-clad descendents will be crouched over fires.
sentences.chinese: 我們的子孫將穿裘裹皮，蜷縮在火堆旁。

sentences.english: The embossment requires at least 500 skill in Leatherworking to remain active.
sentences.chinese: 雕飾需要至少500點制皮技能才能生效。

sentences.english: The cat asked him for some money.
And if it spread much abroad in the skin, then the priest shall pronounce him unclean: it is a plague.
sentences.chinese: 若在皮上發散開了，祭司就要定他爲不潔淨，是災病。

sentences.english: Would you give me the diction whose cover is red.
sentences.chinese: 你能把那本字典給我嗎？就是那本皮是紅的。

definition: outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
same as 剝皮|剥皮[bao1 pi2]
to skin/to flay/to excoriate/to peel/to bark at sb/to physically punish sb
